description:
दोषरहितं कार्याणि। धन्यवादा. 

For the Ignorant people who randomly spread hate,
Try to learn beyond your limited vocabulary, Why don't you try to prove your point logically instead writing hate messages. If you cant read multiple or भारतिया traditional languages, that doesn't mean they don't exist.

There should be North Indian Style Charts too. There should be information about Nakshatra right under the birth chart such as which planet is placed in which nakshatra and which pada of that nakshatras. 

There should be a bit of info of what house supports what part, problems, happiness of our life. The only thing I liked about this app that it show moon's live movement in nakshatra and it's digree.
This does not qualify to be classified under "science".
Great software for Vedic Astrology. This software is not for those who believe that Science is God. This software reflects ancient wisdom.
summary: Great Software. Keep it up. Recommend it fully

description: Shodas vargas, vinshottari, yogini, kalchakr dasha and many other dashas. Transit. Very useful app for ubuntu users.
summary: contains all the important features of vedic astrology
